verses.text: Sin whispers within \w the|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wicked, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* no dread \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* before \w their|strong="H3068"\w* eyes.

\w It|strong="H7130"\w* flatters \w them|strong="H5048"\w* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w their|strong="H7130"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H7130"\w* \w sin|strong="H6588"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* found \w out|strong="H7563"\w*.

First, \w their|strong="H3588"\w* speech \w becomes|strong="H3588"\w* wicked \w and|strong="H5869"\w* false, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* give up acting wisely \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w well|strong="H5869"\w*.

Then \w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w plot|strong="H1697"\w* deliberate wrong, take their stand \w on|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* wicked \w way|strong="H1697"\w*, \w without|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* least shrinking \w from|strong="H1697"\w* evil.
\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* love, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, touches \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heavens, \w your|strong="H5921"\w* faithfulness reaches \w the|strong="H5921"\w* clouds.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* justice \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* great mountains, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* judgments \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* broad sea. \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w you|strong="H5704"\w* save people \w and|strong="H3068"\w* animals.

How precious \w your|strong="H3068"\w* love, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*! \w All|strong="H3467"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* seek shelter \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* wings.

\w They|strong="H4100"\w* feast \w on|strong="H3671"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w fat|strong="H3368"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H4100"\w* house, \w they|strong="H4100"\w* drink \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H4100"\w* brook \w of|strong="H1121"\w* delights.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H1004"\w* life, \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* light \w that|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* yours \w we|strong="H3068"\w* see light.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* continue \w your|strong="H7200"\w* grace \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* faithful, \w your|strong="H7200"\w* love \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* upright \w in|strong="H7200"\w* heart.
Let \w no|strong="H3045"\w* arrogant foot tread \w upon|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H4900"\w*, \w no|strong="H3045"\w* wicked hand drive \w me|strong="H4900"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* exile.

There \w the|strong="H3027"\w* workers \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w wrong|strong="H7563"\w* lie prostrate, thrust \w down|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* rise up \w no|strong="H7563"\w* \w more|strong="H7563"\w*.
